MACRO.NAME: m_cycloneii_dsp_block
MACRO.DEFINITION: (DEDICATED_MULTIPLIER_CIRCUITRY == YES || DEDICATED_MULTIPLIER_CIRCUITRY == AUTO || USE_WIZARD == ON) and (mfam_family_cycloneii)

MACRO.NAME: m_titan_dsp_block
MACRO.DEFINITION: (DEDICATED_MULTIPLIER_CIRCUITRY == YES || DEDICATED_MULTIPLIER_CIRCUITRY == AUTO || USE_WIZARD == ON) and mfam_family_stratixiii

MACRO.NAME: m_base_stratixii_features
MACRO.DEFINITION: is_used(mult01_round) ||is_used(mult01_saturation) || is_used(mult23_round) ||is_used(mult23_saturation) || is_used(addnsub1_round) ||is_used(addnsub3_round) || MULTIPLIER01_ROUNDING == "yes" || MULTIPLIER01_SATURATION == "yes" || MULTIPLIER23_ROUNDING == "yes" || MULTIPLIER23_SATURATION == "yes" || ADDER1_ROUNDING == "yes" || ADDER3_ROUNDING == "yes"

MACRO.NAME: m_use_sign_extend
MACRO.DEFINITION: (ACCUMULATOR == YES || CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES) and ((WIDTH_RESULT gt (WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B + 8)) || (output_saturation != NO || chainout_saturation != NO))

MACRO.NAME: m_no_saturate
MACRO.DEFINITION: ((WIDTH_RESULT lt 29) and m_44_res) || (WIDTH_A gt 18) || (WIDTH_B gt 18) || (WIDTH_RESULT gt 44) || m_unsigned_out || m_base_stratixii_features || (SHIFT_MODE != NO) || INPUT_SOURCE_B0 == str(LOOPBACK)

MACRO.NAME: m_no_round
MACRO.DEFINITION: (((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B) lt 15) and !m_44_res )||(m_use_sign_extend and ((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B) lt 7))||(!m_use_sign_extend and (WIDTH_RESULT lt 15)) || (WIDTH_A gt 18) || (WIDTH_B gt 18) || (WIDTH_RESULT gt 44) || m_unsigned_out || m_base_stratixii_features || SHIFT_MODE != NO

MACRO.NAME: m_one_level_adder_in_one_atom
MACRO.DEFINITION: ((REPRESENTATION_A == SIGNED) and (REPRESENTATION_B == SIGNED) and (WIDTH_A == 18) and (WIDTH_B== 18)) || ((WIDTH_A lt 18) and (WIDTH_B lt 18))

MACRO.NAME: m_possible_54_mode
MACRO.DEFINITION: ((WIDTH_A gt 36) and (WIDTH_A lt 55)) and ((WIDTH_B gt 36) and (WIDTH_B lt 55)) and !is_used(signa) and !is_used(signb) and (m_double_signed_input || m_unsigned_out) and m_titan_dsp_block and (number_of_multipliers == 1)

MACRO.NAME: m_accum_width_with_overflow
MACRO.DEFINITION: ((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B + 8) == WIDTH_RESULT) and m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == YES ) and (output_saturation == NO)

MACRO.NAME: m_sym_sat_allowed
MACRO.DEFINITION: ((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B) == 36) || (((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B) gt 15) and ((WIDTH_A + WIDTH_B) lt 30))

MACRO.NAME: m_use_full_mac
MACRO.DEFINITION: is_used(mult01_round) ||is_used(mult01_saturation) || is_used(mult23_round) ||is_used(mult23_saturation) || is_used(addnsub1_round) ||is_used(addnsub3_round) || MULTIPLIER01_ROUNDING == "yes" || MULTIPLIER01_SATURATION == "YES" || MULTIPLIER23_ROUNDING == "YES" || MULTIPLIER23_SATURATION == "YES" || ADDER1_ROUNDING == "YES" || ADDER3_ROUNDING == "YES"

MACRO.NAME: m_aclr3_used
MACRO.DEFINITION: (INPUT_ACLR_A0 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_A1 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_A2 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_A3 == "aclr3") || (INPUT_ACLR_B0 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_B1 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_B2 == "aclr3") ||(INPUT_ACLR_B3 == "aclr3") || (MULTIPLIER_ACLR0 == "aclr3") ||(MULTIPLIER_ACLR1 == "aclr3") || (MULTIPLIER_ACLR2 == "aclr3") ||(MULTIPLIER_ACLR3 == "aclr3") || OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || sign_aclr_a == "aclr3" || sign_pipeline_aclr_a == "aclr3" || sign_aclr_b == "aclr3" || sign_pipeline_aclr_b == "aclr3" || ADDNSUB_MULTIPLIER_ACLR1 == "aclr3" || ADDNSUB_MULTIPLIER_ACLR3 == "aclr3" || ADDNSUB_MULTIPLIER_PIPELINE_ACLR1 == "aclr3" || ADDNSUB_MULTIPLIER_PIPELINE_ACLR3 == "aclr3" || MULT01_ROUND_ACLR== "aclr3" || MULT23_ROUND_ACLR== "aclr3" || mult01_saturation_aclr== "aclr3" || mult23_saturation_aclr== "aclr3" || addnsub1_round_aclr == "aclr3" || addnsub3_round_aclr == "aclr3"|| addnsub1_round_pipeline_aclr == "aclr3" || addnsub3_round_pipeline_aclr == "aclr3"|| SCANOUTA_ACLR == "aclr3" ||CHAINOUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || OUTPUT_ROUND_ACLR == "aclr3" || OUTPUT_ROUND_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || OUTPUT_SATURATE_ACLR == "aclr3" || OUTPUT_SATURATE_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_ROUND_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_ROUND_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_ROUND_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_SATURATE_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_SATURATE_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || CHAINOUT_SATURATE_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || ZERO_CHAINOUT_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || ZERO_LOOPBACK_ACLR == "aclr3" ||ZERO_LOOPBACK_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || ZERO_LOOPBACK_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || ACCUM_SLOAD_ACLR == "aclr3" || ACCUM_SLOAD_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || ROTATE_ACLR == "aclr3" || ROTATE_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || ROTATE_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3" || SHIFT_RIGHT_ACLR == "aclr3" || SHIFT_RIGHT_PIPELINE_ACLR == "aclr3" || SHIFT_RIGHT_OUTPUT_ACLR == "aclr3"

FORCE_VALUE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and (CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES || ACCUMULATOR == YES) || (number_of_multipliers gt 1)

FORCE_RANGE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and SHIFT_MODE == NO and ACCUMULATOR == NO and CHAINOUT_ADDER == NO
(m_titan_dsp_block and is_used(scanouta) and m_scanchain_a and CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES and WIDTH_A == 18)

FORCE_VALUE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and SCANOUTA_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(scanouta)

FORCE_RANGE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and INPUT_SOURCE_B0 == str(LOOPBACK) and INPUT_REGISTER_B0 == unregistered and MULTIPLIER_REGISTER0 == unregistered

FORCE_VALUE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and ACCUM_SLOAD_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(accum_sload)
m_titan_dsp_block and ACCUM_SLOAD_PIPELINE_REGISTER!= UNREGISTERED and is_used(accum_sload)
m_titan_dsp_block and ZERO_LOOPBACK_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(zero_loopback)
m_titan_dsp_block and ZERO_LOOPBACK_PIPELINE_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(zero_loopback)
m_titan_dsp_block and ZERO_LOOPBACK_OUTPUT_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(zero_loopback)
m_titan_dsp_block and ZERO_CHAINOUT_OUTPUT_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(zero_chainout)
m_titan_dsp_block and SHIFT_RIGHT_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(shift_right)
m_titan_dsp_block and SHIFT_RIGHT_PIPELINE_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(shift_right)
m_titan_dsp_block and SHIFT_RIGHT_OUTPUT_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(shift_right)
m_titan_dsp_block and ROTATE_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(rotate)
m_titan_dsp_block and ROTATE_PIPELINE_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(rotate)
m_titan_dsp_block and ROTATE_OUTPUT_REGISTER != UNREGISTERED and is_used(rotate)
(!m_titan_dsp_block) || SHIFT_MODE != NO || CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES || ACCUMULATOR == YES || m_no_round
WIDTH_A == 18 and WIDTH_B == 18 and WIDTH_RESULT gt 36 and NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS == 2 and m_titan_dsp_block
(m_titan_dsp_block) and WIDTH_A == 18 and WIDTH_B == 18 and WIDTH_RESULT gt 36 and NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS == 2

FORCE_RANGE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == YES || CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES) and (m_use_sign_extend || OUTPUT_ROUNDING != NO) and (OUTPUT_ROUNDING != NO || CHAINOUT_ROUNDING != NO)
m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == YES || CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES) and !m_use_sign_extend and (OUTPUT_ROUNDING != NO || CHAINOUT_ROUNDING != NO)
m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == NO and CHAINOUT_ADDER == NO and SHIFT_MODE == NO ) and (OUTPUT_ROUNDING != NO || CHAINOUT_ROUNDING != NO)
m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == YES || CHAINOUT_ADDER == YES) and m_use_sign_extend and (OUTPUT_SATURATION != NO || CHAINOUT_SATURATION != NO)
m_titan_dsp_block and (ACCUMULATOR == NO and CHAINOUT_ADDER == NO and SHIFT_MODE == NO ) and (OUTPUT_SATURATION != NO || CHAINOUT_SATURATION != NO)
m_titan_dsp_block and (NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS == 2) and (WIDTH_A lt 19) and (WIDTH_B lt 19) and (WIDTH_RESULT == (18 + WIDTH_A)) and m_titan_dsp_block

FORCE_VALUE.WHEN: m_titan_dsp_block and (NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS gt 1) and INPUT_SOURCE_B0 == str(LOOPBACK)

STATE.WHEN: (USE_WIZARD == ON) and is_used(clock1) and !is_used(ena0) and is_used(clock0)
(USE_WIZARD == ON) and is_used(clock2) and ((!is_used(ena0) and is_used(clock0)) || (!is_used(ena1) and is_used(clock1)))
(USE_WIZARD == ON) and is_used(clock3) and (is_used(ena0) || is_used(ena1) || is_used(ena2))
(USE_WIZARD == ON) and is_used(clock3) and ((!is_used(ena0) and is_used(clock0)) || (!is_used(ena1) and is_used(clock1)) || (!is_used(ena2) and is_used(clock2)))

state.WHEN: (NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS == 3 and !m_titan_dsp_block) || (SHIFT_MODE == YES) || (WIDTH_A gt 18) || (WIDTH_B gt 18) || INPUT_SOURCE_B0 == str(LOOPBACK)
(NUMBER_OF_MULTIPLIERS == 3 and !m_titan_dsp_block) || (SHIFT_MODE == YES) || (WIDTH_A gt 18) || (WIDTH_B gt 18) || INPUT_SOURCE_B0 == str(LOOPBACK)
